name: NSSaveChangesRequest
desc: An encapsulation of a collection of changes to be made by an object store in response to a save operation on a managed object context.

items.name: init(inserted: Set<NSManagedObject>?, updated: Set<NSManagedObject>?, deleted: Set<NSManagedObject>?, locked: Set<NSManagedObject>?)
items.desc: Initializes a save changes request with collections of given changes.

items.name: var insertedObjects: Set<NSManagedObject>?
items.desc: The objects that were inserted into the calling context.

items.name: var updatedObjects: Set<NSManagedObject>?
items.desc: The objects that were modified in the calling context.

items.name: var deletedObjects: Set<NSManagedObject>?
items.desc: The objects that were deleted in the calling context.

items.name: var lockedObjects: Set<NSManagedObject>?
items.desc: The objects that were flagged for optimistic locking on the calling context.
